data.question: What is the empirical formula of compound 1'?
What is the coordination mode of the apical M atoms in the icosahedral core to the cyclo-Pn5 ligand?
What is the yield of compound 3'?
Is the [As@Co12] core considered an ideal icosahedron?
data.answer: Yes, the Co‒Co bond distances show an almost ideal icosahedron with Ih symmetry.

data.question: What is the primary reason for the difficulty in isolating cyclo-As5 or cyclo-Sb5 flanked compounds?
data.answer: Heavier analogues of group 15 have lower dissociation energy, increasing the destabilizing factor.

data.question: What is the role of the icosahedral [Pn@M12] core in the sandwich-type complexes?
data.answer: It serves as a structural support displaying a discrete electronic shell structure involved in the stabilization of the outer structural layer.

data.question: Are the synthesized sandwich-type clusters considered the first cluster analogues to a sandwich complex based on a central icosahedral core?
What is the symmetry of the obtained sandwich-like D5d species in their favored spin state?
Does the equatorial Sb10 ring carry more negative charge than the overall charge from (Sb5)2 fragments in [Sb@Fe12Sb10(Sb5)2]5–?
What is the main bonding scheme towards the 6π-As5 rings revealed by orbital analysis?
data.answer: The π1-, π2- and π3-As5 orbitals collectively donate charge towards the 4s Co orbitals of the core.

data.question: Is the bond strength between coordination centre [Pn@M12Pn10]n– and the ligand Pn5– larger in [As@Co12As10(As5)2]4– compared to [Ti(η5-P5)2]2–?
What is the crystal system of compound 1'?
What is the role of 18-crown-6 in the synthesis of the sandwich-type anions?
data.answer: It is used to facilitate the reaction by dissolving the precursors in the synthesis process.

data.question: Are the synthesized sandwich-type clusters anticipated to pave the way for the design and synthesis of other sandwich compounds involving a 3D coordination centre?
What is the significance of the discrete electronic shell structure in the stabilization of the outer structural layer of the sandwich-type clusters?
data.answer: It mimics isolated transition metals and is involved in the stabilization of the outer structural layer, extending the concept of mononuclear sandwich complexes to cluster-coordination-centred sandwich complexes.

data.question: What is the space group of compound 2'?

Is the average bond distance between the apical cobalt and five arsenic atoms of the cyclo-As5 in 2, 2.381(2) Å, comparable to that between the waist cobalt atoms and the arsenic atoms in the equatorial As10 fragment?
What is the role of ethylenediamine in the synthesis of the sandwich-type anions?
data.answer: It acts as a solvent and possibly as a ligand in the reaction mixture.

data.question: What is the yield of compound 1'?
Does the synthesis of the sandwich-type clusters involve a Zintl ion synthesis strategy?
